head: Divorce Notice.
p: In the U.S. District Court of the Second Judicial District of W.T., holding terms at Olympia. November Term, 1867.

YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED that Elizabeth Grow. Plaintiff herein has filed her complaint heard at the next term thereof, which shall commence two months or more after the 21st day of August, 1867, and unless you appear at said term and amswer, the same will be taken as confessed and the prayer thereof granted.
The object and prayer of said complaint is to procure a decree of divorce on the ground of abandonment and your failure to make provision for the support of said Plaintiff.
Complaint filed August 21, 1867. First publication Aug. 31, 1867.
